dialogue.text: Good evening! Do you have a reservation?
dialogue.zh:
Good evening! 你 有 a reservation?
Good evening! Do あなた have a reservation?

dialogue.text: Hi, I don’t. Do you have a table for two?
dialogue.zh:
嗨, 我 don’t. 你 有 a 桌 two?
こんにちは, 私 don’t. Do あなた have a table for two?

dialogue.text: How many people in your party?
dialogue.zh:
How many people in your party?
How many people in your party?

Two.
Two.

dialogue.text: Would you like a table or a booth?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like a 桌 or a booth?
Would あなた like a table or a booth?

A 桌 是 fine.
A table 私 fine.

dialogue.text: Do you prefer indoor or outdoor seating?
dialogue.zh:
你 prefer indoor or outdoor seating?
Do あなた prefer indoor or outdoor seating?

Indoor, 請.
Indoor, お願いします.

dialogue.text: We can seat you in about ten minutes.
dialogue.zh:
We 可以 seat 你 in about ten minutes.
We できます seat あなた in about ten minutes.

好的, we 可以 wait.
わかりました, we できます wait.

May 我 有 your name?
May 私 have your name?

Raymond.
Raymond.

dialogue.text: Can I get a phone number in case we call you?
dialogue.zh:
可以 我 get a phone number in case we call 你?
できます 私 get a phone number in case we call あなた?

當然, it’s 09xx-xxx-xxx.
もちろん, it’s 09xx-xxx-xxx.

dialogue.text: Thanks. Please wait near the entrance.
dialogue.zh:
謝謝. 請 wait near the entrance.
ありがとう. お願いします wait near the entrance.

Alright.
Alright.

dialogue.text: While you wait, would you like to see the menu?
dialogue.zh:
While 你 wait, would 你 like to see the 菜單?
While あなた wait, would あなた like to see the メニュー?

是的, 請.
はい, お願いします.

dialogue.text: Here you go. Any allergies we should know about?
dialogue.zh:
Here 你 go. 任何 allergies we should know about?
Here あなた go. Any allergies we should know about?

不 allergies.
いいえ allergies.

dialogue.text: Great. We’ll call your name soon.
dialogue.zh:
太好了. We’ll call your name soon.
いいですね. We’ll call your name soon.

謝謝.
ありがとう.

Raymond, your 桌 是 ready.
Raymond, your table 私 ready.

太好了.
いいですね.

Right this way.
Right this way.

好的.
わかりました.

dialogue.text: Here are your menus and water.
dialogue.zh:
Here 是 your 菜單 and 水.
Here are your メニュー and 水.

謝謝 你.
ありがとう あなた.

dialogue.text: Let me know when you’re ready to order.
dialogue.zh:
Let me know when 你’re ready to 點餐.
Let me know when あなた’re ready to 注文.

We will.
We will.
